channel.title: How do I change the chances of an NPC's drop? (317)
channel.description:
Hey guys if anyone could help me out with this I'ld be really appreciative.
So I've just put general graardor on my Server and at the moment he drops Godswords, Problem is he drops like every GS all the time and I want to make it so that Godswords are harder to get.
I catch on pretty quick so if someone could just give me a 2 second answer that'ld be great.
I'm thinking that it's somewhere in the npcdrop folder and this is what Graardor looks like atm:
//general graardor npcdrop = 1115 526 1 1 npcdrop = 1115 35 1 1 npcdrop = 1115 8100 1 1 npcdrop = 1115 1107 1 5 npcdrop = 1115 1077 1 1 npcdrop = 1115 667 1 1
Thanks

item.title: How do I change the chances of an NPC's drop? (317)
item.dc:creator: @Controlkill Controlkill
item.description:
@Controlkill wrote:

[quote=“Mercifies, post:4, topic:355907”][quote author=Controlkill link=topic=452452.msg3315497#msg3315497 date=1282277813]

npcdrop = 1115 667 1 1
npcdrop =npc id /item drop /how many it drops/ percentage of it droping that item

So do you mean that there was a 1% chance of 1115 dropping 667?
Because with these settings he’s still dropping it every time o.o
[/quote]

Yes he should be dropping it at a 1% chance. Either your code is altered or it is defective. Try changing the item to a different item just to test out if your code is affective and working.[/quote]

I’ll just mess around with it a little and eventually I should get it to work out.

Thanks alot to the both of you

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the chances of an NPC's drop? (317)

item.title: How do I change the chances of an NPC's drop? (317)
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

[quote=“Controlkill, post:3, topic:355907”][quote author=Ground zero 317 link=topic=452452.msg3315462#msg3315462 date=1282275743]
npcdrop = 1115 667 1 1
npcdrop =npc id /item drop /how many it drops/ percentage of it droping that item
[/quote]

So do you mean that there was a 1% chance of 1115 dropping 667?
Because with these settings he’s still dropping it every time o.o[/quote]

Yes he should be dropping it at a 1% chance. Either your code is altered or it is defective. Try changing the item to a different item just to test out if your code is affective and working.

Read full topic
